//Comment: Used as default parameters to mediaInfo.js. Place this config file in ~/etc/mediaInfo.js, if no flags are passed when calling, it will look for this config in the ~/etc/ dir.

Sites.//Comment-siteID: used in place of the -s|--site_id flag
Sites.//Comment-lastUpdated: used in place of the -l|--lastupdated flag
Sites.//comment-configFileName: used in place of -c|--config flag. This file is located in the applications dir config/config_mediainfo_sites.js ..
